Text: Electric Market Forecasting Conferencehope to see you at this years Electric Market Forecasting Conference The purpose of this email is to recap the conference give you the latest agenda and to remind you of the approaching deadline f or early registration If you register by June th the early registration fe e is only I recommend that you reserve your room at Skamania Lodge as soon as possible They go quickly For more information see below and on the attachment Or go to our websit e at wwwepiscom The conference information is at wwwepiscomEventconferencehtm We look forward to seeing you Regards Lee Barney Forecasting Challenges in Electricity Markets Electric Market Forecasting Conference Skamania Lodge Washington September IMAGE Todays electricity markets are more challenging to predict than ever Discover the keys to managing risk in volatile energy markets The conference venue is the beautiful Skamania Lodge in the scenic Columbia River Gorge minutes East of Portland International Airport Portland Oregon A mind expanding setting for an executiveand professional level exchange of information and strategies concerning North American energy markets Navigating Todays Energy Markets The challenges of taming energy markets dont begin and end in Californi a Volatility and risk are present in every market region forcing all participants to carefully examine the underlying factors and accurately assess their current and future market positions For the th year EPIS Inc developer of the AURORA electric market mode l has assembled a stimulating program of interest to any company exposed to energy market risks This years agenda includes a detailed look at the various energy trading regions in the US and Canada an exploration of market conditions and market dynamics This years conference will feature thoughtful exchanges on Electric and Gas Markets and Beyond US Markets Crisis in the West Emerging Issues in the East and ERCOT Keys to US Electric and Gas Forward Markets Issues in Canadian Markets Gas Hedging Strategies and Electric Markets Price and Volume Volatility in Turbulent Markets New Resources When and Where to Develop Youll hear from toplevel speakers representing companies that have bee n there Williams Energy Marketing FPL Energy NYMEX ENRON DTE Energy Deutsche Bank and others Plus there will be informative roll upyoursleeves sessions on applied forecasting techniques by Williams Energy Marketing Pinnacle West GenerSys Southern California Edison Register for Conference Register by sending the registration information on the attachment to EPIS by Fax MAIL Blankenship Rd Suite West Linn OR Or register by phone at x Agenda Electric Market Forecasting Conferencedoc olebmp Agenda Electric Market Forecasting
